text: "Goodbye" is a power ballad by the American hard rock band Night Ranger. It was released on November 9, 1985, as the third and last single from their album 7 Wishes. It was written by guitarist Jeff Watson and singer Jack Blades. Reaching No. 17, the song is the last U.S. top 20 hit for the band to date.
